name: Binora
description:
Description

Binora is an audio puzzle game where the objective is to recreate a soundscape. Once the game starts, a soundscape will play for one minute; make sure  to memorize how loud each sound is, and what side it is coming from, as you will be tasked with recreating the soundscape. Choose one of the three available levels and test your aural skills!

Controls

The entire game features a descriptive voice over. Additionally, you may refer to the controls below. The game is intended to be played using a gamepad, but keyboard support has been added as an extra feature.

Menu

You may use the mouse to navigate, or, alternatively:

Control Gamepad Keyboard Confirm Special Right Button (e.g. DS4 "Start") Enter Return Special Left Button (e.g. DS4 "Share") Escape Accept Tutorial Right Shoulder Button (e.g. DS4 "R2") PageUp Decline Tutorial Left Shoulder Button (e.g. DS4 "L2") Insert Game ControlGamepadKeyboardConfirm Soundscape / Skip SectionSpecial Right Button (e.g. DS4 "Start")EnterExitSpecial Left Button (e.g. DS4 "Share")EscapeAudit Your SoundscapeAny Shoulder ButtonQ or EManipulate VolumeAny Thumbstick (Y Axis)W (decrease) and S (increase)Manipulate DirectionAny Thumbstick (X Axis)A (left) and D (right)Select BackgroundsTrigger ButtonsInsert or PageUpSelect EmittersFace Buttons (e.g. DS4 "X")Arrow KeysSelect SpecsD-Pad KeysHome, Delete, End, PageDown Credits Matheus Vilano
